name: Ball Arena (KoreyMastermind)
description:
Use the arrow keys to control the ball.

Red Crystals Give 5 Health.

Gold Crystals Give 1 Gold.

White Crystals Give 1 Bomb.

Enemies do 10 damage on contact and explode after a delay.

Enter the store by pressing Z in any of the corners of the map. 

X exits the store menu.

The store has bombs for sell as well as a force field.

After force field is unlocked you may purchase a shorter 

recharge rate.

Press Space to begin, how long can you last ;)
